title:
Would you do an article on Social Security $\'s?

For instance, what are the different SS programs (retirees receiving SS, Disabilty program, etc) and what has each one spent, say, in the past 2 years.  And how many people are enrolled in each one?  And, what is the total revenue collected for each of the last 2 years?

Would you do the same for Medicare?
text:
The focus of MyReporter.com is answering questions about life in
Coastal North Carolina. That's where we devote our resources.
Unfortunately, your question does not meet that criteria.



I will forward your request to Sherry Jones, metro editor of the
StarNews for consideration.
